summary: 2001 TOWN & COUNTRY AIRBAG LIGHT LIGHTS UP INTERMITTENTLY.  THE DEALER SAYS A CLOCKSPRING HAS FAILED NOT COVERED BY THE MANUFACTURER.  THE DEALER WILL REPAIR BUT CHARGES A DEDUCTIBLE PER THE EXTENDED WARRANTY.  THIS IS A SAFETY DEFECT THAT SHOULD BE COVERED BY THE MANUFACTURER, AGGRAVATED BY THE FACT THAT 1998-2000 VEHICLES, JUST BEFORE THIS MODEL YEAR, ARE COVERED BY A RECALL FOR THE EXACT SAME ITEM.
